name: Arc'teryx Ardena Dress - Women's
description:
A solid choice for weekend getaways. The Ardena is lightweight, ultra packable, and ultra comfortable, all great qualities for a summer dress.Lightweight fabric blends organic and recycled fibres.2 front pockets.Elasticised waist.Relaxed fit.
